channel.title: Ballination
channel.description:
[center][SIZE=25pt]W[/SIZE]elcome to Ballination. This is a project I finished making. I enjoyed making it and I hope you all like it. There are some things you can improve but i've made it simple to edit. Enjoy! Base: Dodian Devolution 7.0 Developer: *ballin jr.*
[size=15pt]Features:[/size]
[ul][li][i]thieving[/i][/li] [li][i]player rendering[/i][/li] [li][i]banking[/i][/li] [li][i]npcs[/i][/li] [li][i]npc dialouge[/i][/li] [li][i]shops[/i][/li] [li][i]PREMIUM WORKING!!!![/i][/li] [li][i]Working Global Objects[/i][/li] [li][i]~Doors work~[/i][/li] [li][i]premium and non-premium items![/i][/li] [li][i]some silab items(you add 'em!)[/i][/li] [li][i]aggressive npc's[/i][/li] [li][i]Simple aggressive barrows[/i][/li] [li][i]basic bone burying prayer[/i][/li] [li][i]food eating[/i][/li] [li][i]item level requirements[/i][/li] [li][i]agility[/i][/li] [li][i]slayer[/i][/li] [li][i]full combat[/li] [li][i]GODSWORD STANCE IN DEVO!![/i][/li] [li][i]Working Potions[/i][/li] [li][i]much more![/i][/li][/ul]
[size=15pt]Pictures:[/size] [IMG]http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii131/Reforced911/ballination1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii131/Reforced911/ballination2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii131/Reforced911/ballination3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii131/Reforced911/ballination4.png[/img]
[size=15pt]Videos!(sorry for low quality)[/size] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bFcWIRWmkSI]Ballination Npc's![/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SoAJHrBi0vo]Ballination Slayer![/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p1bal5xTBaM]Ballination Agility![/url]
[size=10pt]Download links:[/size] [url=http://www.MegaShare.com/594326]MegaShare![/url] [url=http://uppit.com/UQ17AZ]Uppit![/url]
[size=25pt]Please, Please post feedback![/size]
[/center]

item.title: Ballination
item.dc:creator: @_ballin_jr *ballin jr.*
item.description:
@_ballin_jr wrote:

[center][SIZE=25pt]W[/SIZE]elcome to Ballination. This is a project I finished making. I enjoyed making it and I hope you all like it. There are some things you can improve but i’ve made it simple to edit. Enjoy!
Base: Dodian Devolution 7.0
Developer: ballin jr.

[size=15pt]Features:[/size]

[ul][li]thieving[/li]
[li]player rendering[/li]
[li]banking[/li]
[li]npcs[/li]
[li]npc dialouge[/li]
[li]shops[/li]
[li]PREMIUM WORKING!!![/li]
[li]Working Global Objects[/li]
[li]~Doors work~[/li]
[li]premium and non-premium items![/li]
[li]some silab items(you add 'em!)[/li]
[li]aggressive npc’s[/li]
[li]Simple aggressive barrows[/li]
[li]basic bone burying prayer[/li]
[li]food eating[/li]
[li]item level requirements[/li]
[li]agility[/li]
[li]slayer[/li]
[li][i]full combat[/li]
[li]GODSWORD STANCE IN DEVO!![/li]
[li]Working Potions[/li]
[li]much more![/li][/ul]

[size=15pt]Pictures:[/size]

ballination1.png766×497

ballination2.png762×498

ballination3.png764×497

ballination4.png764×497

[size=15pt]Videos!(sorry for low quality)[/size]

Ballination Slayer!
Ballination Agility!

[size=10pt]Download links:[/size]

Uppit!

[size=25pt]Please, Please post feedback![/size]

[/center]
